text: The 2011 Kowloon City District Council election was held on 6 November 2011 to elect all 22 elected members to the 25-member District Council. ==Overall election results== Before election: {| style="width:50%; text-align:center;" |+ ↓ |- style="color:white;" | style="background:green; width:27.27%;" | 6 | style="background:red; width:72.73%;" | 16 |- | Pro-dem | Pro-Beijing |} Change in composition: {| style="width:50%; text-align:center;" |+ ↓ |- style="color:white;" | style="background:green; width:22.73%;" | 5 | style="background:red; width:77.27%;" | 17 |- | Pro-dem | Pro-Beijing |} ==References== ==External links== * Election Results - Overall Results Category:2011 Hong Kong local elections
title: 2011 Kowloon City District Council election
